module.name: unt_PicPasFile
module.short: PicPasFile is a Hndler for PicPas-Language files

element.name: Tidx
element.short: TIdx is an index-Entry for a specific Item and Language of the Pas-File.

element.name: Tidx.lnNrStart
element.short: lnNrStart holds the (0-based) Linenumber of the Entry

element.name: Tidx.iStartOffset
element.short: iStartOffset holds the Character-Offset in the line of that entry

element.name: Tidx.lnNrEnd
element.short: lnNrEnd holds the linenumber of the end of the entry

element.name: Tidx.iendOffset
element.short: iEndOffset holds the character-offset of the end of the entry
